Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Augusta
ShortDescription: 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Augusta, Central, Division, and Austin due to, street blockage at Austin/Augusta.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Austin, Augusta, Central, Division, and Austin due to, street blockage at Austin/Augusta.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Soutbound Reroute near Austin/Thomas
ShortDescription: SB 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, Division, Central, Augusta and Ridgeland due to, street blockage near Austin/Thomas.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, Division, Central, Augusta and Ridgeland due to, street blockage near Austin/Thomas.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #100 Jeffery Manor Express Temporary Reroute at 100th/Yates
ShortDescription: 100 Jeffery Manor Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 100th, Yates, 99th, Bensley and 100th due to, street blockage near 100th/Yates.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#100 Jeffery Manor Express  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 100th, Yates, 99th, Bensley and 100th due to, street blockage near 100th/Yates.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #49 Western, #X49 Western Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Western/Taylor
ShortDescription: NB #49 Western, #X49 Western Exp buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Taylor, Ogden, Damen, Harrison & Western due to street blockage near Western/Taylor

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #49 Western, #X49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Taylor, Ogden, Damen, Harrison and Western due to street blockage near Western/Taylor.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute near 71st/Jeffrey
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses temp. rerouted NB: 71st, Yates, South Shore, 67th, Jeffrey and 71st; SB 71st, Jeffrey, 73rd and Exchange due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 71st/Jeffrey.

Northbound buses will operate via 71st, Yates, South Shore, 67th, Jeffrey and 71st.

Southbound buses will operate via 71st, Jeffrey, 73rd and Exchange.

Allow extra travel time.
